titles.title: A bill to award a Congressional Gold Medal, collectively, to the United States Army Rangers Veterans of World War II in recognition of their extraordinary service during World War II.
United States Army Rangers Veterans of World War II Congressional Gold Medal Act
United States Army Rangers Veterans of World War II Congressional Gold Medal Act
United States Army Rangers Veterans of World War II Congressional Gold Medal Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
